byline.original: By DAVID BROOKS AND GAIL COLLINS

abstract: Public opinion on the movement is mixed. How reliable are polls in assessing patterns of human behavior?
snippet: Public opinion on the movement is mixed. How reliable are polls in assessing patterns of human behavior?
lead_paragraph: David Brooks: Gail, can we talk about the overhyping of the Occupy Wall Street movement?

headline.main: Is Occupy Wall Street Being Overhyped?
